abstract: Bank of America will be on the witness stand again on Tuesday, when two of the bank’s board members and one of its senior executives appear before a Congressional committee that has been investigating the merger.
snippet: Bank of America will be on the witness stand again on Tuesday, when two of the bank’s board members and one of its senior executives appear before a Congressional committee that has been investigating the merger.
lead_paragraph: From Louise Story, a DealBook colleague:

headline.main: Congress Digs Deeper Into BofA-Merrill Deal
